channel.title: Here they are...2 new jutsus for billy and emo!!!
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Here they are...2 new jutsus for billy and emo!!!" - Season 2 Billy lvl 3 jutsu, emo lvl 3 jutsu

item.title: Re: Here they are...2 new jutsus for billy and emo!!!
item.content:encoded: Average Jonin could make that much in less than a week, and by the time they even get access to Level 3 Emo and Billy, can probably buy them both outright.

item.title: Re: Here they are...2 new jutsus for billy and emo!!!
item.content:encoded: lol considering that u'll need a lot of days and patience to get both of them and by the time u do ull be just about to loop ull only need those for a last S-rank mission if much

item.title: Re: Here they are...2 new jutsus for billy and emo!!!
item.content:encoded: thx and don't worry I have not bothered to learn Billy's either :)

item.title: Re: Here they are...2 new jutsus for billy and emo!!!
item.content:encoded:
Emosuke Style: Get In The Bucket
XP: 500000
+10 Range, +10 Strength - Billy Bucket needed
0 C
Requires RedEye

I still haven't bothered learning that jutsu. >.>

item.title: Re: Here they are...2 new jutsus for billy and emo!!!
item.content:encoded:
Legacy 4 life.

Knew about the jutsu but forgot to add :P

I'll try to add them now though.

edit: how much XP is needed for Emosuke's jutsu?
I assume you don't know the name either….

item.title: Here they are...2 new jutsus for billy and emo!!!
item.content:encoded:
